select
from his_enter_consumables_details where his_enter_consumables_details.consumables_code = #{consumablesCode,jdbcType=BIGINT} and is_delete = 0

SELECT sum(surplus) as surplus , id, consumables_code, name, type, spec, selling_price, price, enter_cdoe, enter_count, validity_period, create_date, update_date, create_user_id, update_user_id, is_delete FROM his_enter_consumables_details where is_delete = 0 and /*his_enter_consumables_details.validity_period > CURRENT_DATE AND*/ his_enter_consumables_details.surplus>0
and name like concat('%' #{parameter.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
GROUP BY consumables_code
order by ${parameter.orders}

SELECT sum(surplus) as surplus , id, consumables_code, name, type, spec, selling_price, price, enter_cdoe, enter_count, validity_period, create_date, update_date, create_user_id, update_user_id, is_delete FROM his_enter_consumables_details where is_delete = 0 /*and his_enter_consumables_details.validity_period > CURRENT_DATE*/ AND his_enter_consumables_details.surplus>0
and consumables_code like concat('%' #{consumablesCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
GROUP BY consumables_code

SELECT his_enter_consumables_details.* FROM his_enter_consumables_details where his_enter_consumables_details.consumables_code = #{consumablesCode,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND his_enter_consumables_details.surplus > 0 AND is_delete= 0
